name: Spell Book (D&D 5e)
description: Now the easiest method possible for locating and storing your favorite D&D spells. First you can find a spell by selecting your class, then level, or by doing a more generic search. If you find yourself looking the same spells up often just save them to your favorites. No downloads, or weird first time procedures, just open it up and have immediate access. Not only does this app contain content from the original SRD, but also from the supplemental books as well.
